title: Ep 104: Best of Season 2
description:
Head over to Smartass & Sass and use code JUDGIES15 at checkout to get 15% off of your first subscription or order!

Here's the link for Kipp's stream where we read the update. It is around 1:58:00 for the story and a little after foe the update

https://www.twitch.tv/heykipp/v/1482301904?sr=a&t=7112s

In This Episode: We thank our listeners for two years of being judgey with us and share our top 3 stories from reddit and listeners! We coiuldn't do this without all of your support so thank you to each and every one of you piss babies!

Get Judgies Merch Here:

Our Patreon is officially open, if you want to see extra content go check it out! 

Send us mail! (Addressed However You'd Like)
 P.O. Box 58 Ottawa, IL 61350  

Leave a Review! 
Follow us on Twitter
Follow us on Instagram
Intro Music by: Iván 

Story Links:
Gym Pics
Husband's Dinner

3:52 Message to the Fans
5:55 Josh's Top 3 Reddit Stories
12:07 AITA: Gym Pictures
26:33 Erika's Top 3 Reddit Stories
28:10 AITA: Throwing Away Dinner
37:13 Christian's Top 3 Reddit Stories

1:09:10 TIFU: Accident in Pants

1:24:59 Outro
